textContent:
If you're reading this, I’m guessing the night feels a little too long and your thoughts won’t leave you alone. I wish I could be right there beside you, talking you to sleep, running my fingers through your hair, and just making everything feel a little lighter. ðŸ¥º

Since I can't be there physically, let me still remind you of a few things:

You’re safe. You’re loved. You’re on my mind, ALWAYS!!!! ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·

Close your eyes for a second.Imagine me beside you. My hand in yours. My voice softly telling you how much I love you and how lucky I feel every single day to have you. If I could, I’d whisper the kind of things that make your heart feel full and your mind feel quiet.

You know how you sound when you're sleepy? That soft, low tone that makes me melt every single time? I’d do anything to hear it now. Maybe you'd be half-asleep and still trying to say something sweet, like you always do, and I’d be there smiling like an idiot because I love you so damn much!!!!! ðŸ˜­

Take a deep breath, close those beautiful eyes, and let the world fade for a while. You don’t need to carry anything tonight. Just rest. I’ll be right here...thinking of you, praying peace finds you, and loving you more with every beat of my heart.

Goodnight my Umzy baby. You’ve got this. And I’ve got you. ðŸ¤§ðŸ©·
